page.title: 12W.CHILTINGTON RECREATION
page.content: The adults of W.Chilt. are a very active group. However very few clubs meet in the village. (See p.{'W.Chilt' {Clubs)}Many women do not belong to any club but those that do have diverse interests:-{Squash,Badminton,Horses, {Golf,Yachts,Flying,Wine Appreciating, {Bridge & History.}Many women have an interest in{Gardening,Swimming, Bingo {Knitting,Sewing,Dancing & Dressmaking. The men show even more interests with local membership of{Scouts,P.C.C,Lions and the{Silver Band.}Others travel to clubs for{Motor Bikes,Fishing,Sports, {Agriculture,Rotary}and many others. Their most popular hobbies are:-{DIY, {Gardening, Reading, Music (listening), {Angling & Cars,}whilst others enjoy{ {Toy Making, Wine Making,}(perhaps the wine that the wives go to appreciate) {Natural History & Baby Sitting}as well as a wide variety of{sports.
